title: Natural Health Center
description: Natural Health Center is a beautiful and peaceful integrative medicine clinic where you can access the best care natural medicine has to offer.
cleaned_text: Compassionate care changing lives. Centrally located in midtown Anchorage, the Natural Health Center is a refuge of calm & peace. You're on a journey of healing and health and we're here to assist you in achieving and maintaining your optimal health and vitality. Learn more about our [services](/services-overview), meet our [providers](/provider-overview) and [contact us](/contact) to make an appointment. Our services We believe the basis of true healing requires nurturing of the whole person - mind, body, and spirit - within a caring community. We provide holistic, high-quality care to patients of all ages and stages: from prenatal through senior care. Our multi-disciplinary team treats a wide range of conditions, illnesses and injuries, and, most importantly, we provide preventative care. [Learn more.](/services-overview) Our providers Our unique approach is having practitioners from many different disciplines - including [naturopaths](/naturopathic-medicine), [chiropractors](/chiropractic), [acupuncturists](/acupuncture), [family nurse practitioners](/family-medicine), and [massage therapists](/massage) - all under one roof. This allows us to provide individualized and highly effective solutions for your health concerns and overall wellness. Our providers can coordinate your care and build on the patient relationship collaboratively. [Learn more](https://www.nhcak.com/providers) about our providers and [contact us](/contact) to schedule your appointment. Our people Our patients come from all walks of life and so do we. Inclusion is about the actions we take each and every day. We hire great people from a wide variety of backgrounds because it makes our community stronger. Our inclusive culture empowers all of us to connect, belong, and grow. If you share our values and our enthusiasm for alternative healthcare, you will find a home at Natural Health Center. 2021 Best of Alaska - Naturopathic Practice 2021 Best of Alaska - Acupuncture, Mark Larsen Our latest blog post Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD): Considering a Domino Effect Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD) is estimated to occur in about 25% of the U.S. population (and about 30% of the global population), and in 50-70% of individuals with type 2 diabetes (1,2,3). If that sounds like a lot to you, you might be wondering what NAFLD is, how it can be this common, and what we can do to help treat or even reverse NAFLD. Lily George, our adult nurse practitioner, explores this important topic.
